name: Handmade Black Kanagaroo Leather Envelope Clutch
description:
This beautiful Black Soft Leather Envelope Clutches is handmade from Australian kangaroo hide.

Perfectly sized (approx 26cm x 17cm) to fit in all your necessities. Being a classic design, you will use this clutch both night and day and it will stay in style for years to come. The leather ages beautifully!

The clutches are fully lined with unique and vibrant black and white striped cotton fabric and features a small internal pocket with a zipper. The clutches are held securely together by a magnetic clasp.

The clutch is available in a variety of colours each made to order (some colours may be in stock)

More photos available at www.somandtooby.com
